name: @azure/quantum-jobs
description: An isomorphic client library for Azure Quantum
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.audit: node ../../../common/scripts/rush-audit.js && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i --package-lock-only 2>&1 && npm audit
scripts.build:node: tsc -p . && dev-tool run bundle && npm run extract-api
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:test: npm run build:test:node && npm run build:test:browser
scripts.check-format: echo skip format check as this package has only auto generated code
scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-esm dist-browser dist-test dist-test types *.tgz *.log
scripts.execute:samples: npm run build:samples && dev-tool samples run dist-samples/javascript dist-samples/typescript/dist/dist-samples/typescript/src/
scripts.format: echo skip format as this package has only auto generated code
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.lint:fix: eslint package.json api-extractor.json README.md src test --ext .ts,.javascript,.js --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.lint: eslint package.json api-extractor.json README.md src test --ext .ts,.javascript,.js -f html -o search-lintReport.html || exit 0
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && npm run build:test:node && npm run unit-test:node
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build:test:browser && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
